title: construction d une mosque et un daara au senegal
Description: Assalamou aleikoum chers frères et sœurs en Islam.Le Dahira MAME ASTOU WALO M'BACKÉ rassemble des croyants de toutes nationalités ayant embrassé l'Islam en suivant les traces de KHADIMOU RASSUL (le serviteur du prophète SWS), sous le double Ndiguel de Sérigne Mountakha M'backé khalif des mourides et du khalif des BOUSSO BÉ, ils oeuvrent à rendre hommage à cette sainte femme, Mame Astou Walo M'backé descendante directe du prophète Muhammed (SAWS) , mère de Mame Diarra Bousso M'backé qui a donné au monde Cheikh Ahmadou Bamba fondateur du Mouridisme et de la ville sainte de Touba.Digne héritière de sa lignée chérifienne elle a sût être une éducatrice modèle.À la disparition de son mari, elle a pris en charge 12 Daara (école coranique) dans une région dominée à l'époque par les animistes voulant éradiquer l'islam.Ce travail a donné au Sénégal de grands et réputés érudits du coran et encore à ce jour. Nous lançons un appel solennel à tous les musulmans afin de participer à ce projet qui comprend :Un DAARA fillesUn DAARA garçons capacité d'accueil totale de 448 enfantsune mosquéeune résidence d'accueil sur les terres de Nawel, dans le Saloum, là où repose MAME ASTOU WALO M'BACKÉ↪ et révéler ce lieu de pèlerinage inch'Allah.La 1ère pierre à été posée le 9 juin 2021, la fabrication des briques effectuée, les Fondations sont en cours.Nous appellons la Ouma à se joindre à nous par le don de soi, qu'il soit matériel ou personnel, ce qu' ALLAH nous confie comme bien pour atteindre le but que l'on s'est fixé par la grâce de DIEU.Une cagnotte à été créée afin d'assurer la continuité du travail de transmission à l'initiative de cette sainte.Nous en appelons à votre générosité qui est toujours source de bénédictions et de baraka. Puisse ALLAH nous accompagner et nous guider sur les voies qui mènent à sa majesté.Lorsque l'être humain vient au monde, il nait les poings fermés.L'ouverture des mains au profit de nos freres et soeurs en humanité est le travail à accomplir pour faire gagner notre âme humaine dans le combat qu'elle doit mener contre nos instincts animal.Dieureudieufeuté Serigne Touba Khadim Rassoul Diarama Mame Cheikh Ibrahima Fall Baboul MouridineRead more

title: misso jordnia
Description: Olá pessoal, graça e paz! :)Já tem um tempinho que o Oriente Médio e os povos não alcançados pelo evangelho tem queimado em meu coração. E por isso tenho buscado me apronfundar em missões transculturais, nesse tempo estudei em algumas escolas como: Escola 120 - Íris Global; Seminário de Transformação Social pela Jocum Vitória; Escola de Missões Transculturais pela Jocum Campinas e Emmaus pela FAI.Após esse tempo estudando, tenho sentido de Deus o direcionamento para ir ao campo. E então em Outubro estarei indo para Israel por 1 semana onde irei me formar na FAI. E logo em seguida estarei indo para o Sul da Jordânia, onde junto com uma família missionária estarei servindo aos beduínos dando aula de francês para crianças na Escola Refúgio por 3 meses. Seremos os únicos cristãos naquele lugar!Porém para conseguir realizar essa missão preciso da sua ajuda e você pode me ajudar de 3 maneiras:- Orando pelo projeto- Sendo meu intercessor (a)- Contribuindo financeiramente para que aquele deserto no Sul da Jordânia possa florescer!Desde já agradeço, que Deus te abençoe muito! E que Cristo seja anunciado do Ocidente ao Oriente!Read more

title: Apoyo por Abbe Frias
Description: Estimados amigos y fieles,Hola, mi nombre es José Armando Frias M, soy de Villahermosa Tabasco México, actualmente tengo 23 años e ingresé al seminario San Felipe Neri ubicado en las bellas colinas de Florencia Italia, en el mes de septiembre del año 2019; el 29 de Junio del 2020 fue mi toma de sotana y posteriormente el 1 de Julio recibí de manos de SER Cardinal Burke la tonsura clerical. Gracias a Dios el verano pasado terminé mi segundo año de formación, ahora estoy comenzando el tercer año de siete, que es el total de estudio en nuestro seminario.Bendición de su Eminencia después de mi consagración en calidad de esclavo por manos de María Santísima según el método de San Luis María Grignion de Montfort, en mi primer año de formación. Foto familiar con los superiores del Seminario y nuestro fundador Mons Gilles Wach después de la toma de sotana, el 29 de junio 2020.Pero, ¿Por qué el seminario del Instituto Cristo Rey Sumo Sacerdote?Quise entrar al Instituto por la celebración de la Santa Misa y el canto de las horas canónicas dentro del rito tradicional, tambien porque siento el llamado a la vida comunitaria, sumando a la misma pregunta, decidí entrar en Gricigliano por la atmósfera de disciplina que se vive, sobre todo el silencio que se observa día a día -salvo el tiempo que tenemos para recreación comunitaria- siguiendo la enseñanza de uno de nuestros patronos secundarios; San Benito Abad de quien tomamos su amor por la liturgia, la importancia del trabajo manual razón por la cual en el seminario -para el sostenimiento del mismo- fabricamos vino blanco y tinto comenzando desde la siembra hasta el envasado, de igual forma con el aceite de oliva, y también recolectamos miel.Toda nuestra vida de formación y vida pastoral en estos tiempos tan sedientos de verdad, buscamos darla a conocer con el mismo espíritu del Apóstol “Veritatem facientes in caritate”, modo de vida que vamos aprendiendo bajo la guía del director de almas, del doctor de la Iglesia, san Francisco de Sales, uno de los patrones secundarios que tiene el Instituto, sumando la formación que recibimos bajo la dirección de nuestro también patrono Santo Tomás de Aquino.Imagen de Nuestra Señora de Fátima que veneramos en el seminario, a quien dedicamos unos minutos de oracióndespués del rezo de completas.Después de hacerles conocer un poco sobre mi Instituto, les comento el motivo de mi petición de apoyo;En el seminario, aun con nuestro trabajo no podemos cubrir todos los gastos que se generan día a día, puesto que se multiplican por más de 100 seminaristas en total, sumando entre 5 sacerdotes y 1 oblato. Los gastos se dividen en el uso de energía, alimentos, profesores, artículos de aseo personal, etc. Y por ello cada seminarista debe contribuir en la búsqueda de benefactores para cubrir los gastos generados en un año de estudio, incluyendo sus gastos personales como libros, transporte, seguro médico, artículos personales, etc.Por esto recurro a ustedes a través de esta plataforma a fin de recaudar poco a poco la cantidad que pido en esta campaña.Estimados benefactores, yo les aseguro luchar por ser siempre dócil a la voluntad de Dios y mantenerme fiel a la vocación que Dios en su infinita misericordia me ha querido mostrar, poniendo a la Santísima Virgen María de Guadalupe, Madre del verdadero Dios por quien se vive, como Madre, Abogada e Intercesora de mi causa, y también al Glorioso Patriarca san José, Patrono de la Iglesia Universal y, de San Francisco de Sales.Y ante ellos mismos afirmo que mi intención es recta y sin ningún otro fin que santificarme sirviendo a Dios para su Mayor gloria y por la salvación de las almas.En estas circunstancias hago mías las palabras del Santo Rafael Arnaiz que van más o menos así; “Que Dios se lo pague puesto que yo no lo haría mejor que Él”, puesto que sé que nuestro Dios rico en todo, no se dejará jamás ganar en generosidad.Con la seguridad de que rezaré por todos ustedes en la Santa Misa, en la Adoración Eucarística y en mis devociones personales, puesto que han decidido apoyar mi vocación de forma económica y con sus oraciones por amor a Nuestro Señor crucificado y a la santa Iglesia Católica. Prometiendo -en la medida posible- pedir se celebre una Misa mensual en honor a la Santísima Trinidad en acción de gracias por los benefactores que me ha enviado y por las intenciones de cada uno.¡Dios no se dejara ganar en generosidad!Muchas gracias!!!En Cristo Rey,Don José Armando Frias Magaña, seminarista del Instituto Cristo Rey Sumo Sacerdote.English version,Dear Friends and Faithful,Hello, my name is Jose Armando Frias M., I am from Villahermosa Tabasco Mexico, I am currently 23 years old, and I entered the seminary Saint Philipe Neri located in the beautiful hills of Florence Italy, in the month of September 2019; on June 29, 2020 was my taking of the cassock and later on July 1 I received from the hands of H.E. Cardinal Burke the clerical tonsure. Thanks be to God, last summer I finished my second year of formation, now I am beginning the third year of seven, which is the total of study in our seminary.Blessing of His Eminence after my consecration as a slave by the hands of Mary Most Holy according to the method of St. Louis Marie Grignion de Montfort, in my first year of formation.Family photo with the superiors of the Seminary and our founder Mgr Gilles Wach after the taking of the cassock, June 29, 2020.But why the seminary of the Institute of Christ the King Sovereing Priest?I wanted to enter the Institute for the celebration of the Holy Mass and the chanting of the canonical hours within the traditional rite, also because I feel the call to community life, adding to the same question, I decided to enter in Gricigliano for the atmosphere of discipline that is lived, especially the silence that is observed every day - except the time we have for community recreation - following the teaching of one of our secondary patrons: St. Benedict Abbot from whom we take his love for the liturgy, the importance of manual labor, which is why in the seminary - for the support of the seminary - we make white and red wine from planting to bottling, likewise olive oil, and we also collect honey.All our formation and pastoral life in these times so thirsty for truth, we seek to make it known with the same spirit of the Apostle: "Veritatem facientes in caritate", a way of life that we are learning under the guidance of the director of souls, the doctor of the Church, St. Francis de Sales, one of the secondary patrons of the Institute, adding the formation we receive under the direction of our patron Saint Thomas Aquinas.The image of Our Lady of Fatima that we venerate in the seminary, to whom we dedicate a few minutes of prayer after the recitation of Compline.After letting you know a little about my Institute, here is the reason for my request for support:In the seminary, even with our work we cannot cover all the expenses that are generated every day, since they are multiplied by over 100 seminarians in all, adding about 5 priests and 1 Oblate. The expenses are divided into the use of energy, food, teachers, toiletries, etc. And therefore each seminarian must contribute in the search for benefactors to cover the expenses generated in a year of study, including personal expenses such as books, transportation, health insurance, personal items, etc.This is why I am appealing to you through this platform in order to raise little by little the amount I am asking for in this campaign.Dear benefactors, I assure you that I will always strive to be docile to the will of God and remain faithful to the vocation that God in his infinite mercy has wanted to show me, placing the Blessed Virgin Mary of Guadalupe, Mother of the true God through whom one lives, as Mother, Advocate and Intercessor of my cause, and also the Glorious Patriarch St. Joseph, Patron of the Universal Church and St. Francis de Sales.And before them I affirm that my intention is upright and without any other aim than to sanctify myself by serving God for His greater glory and for the salvation of souls.In these circumstances I make my own the words of Saint Rafael Arnaiz which go more or less like this: "May God repay you since I would not do better than Him", since I know that our God, rich in everything, will never allow Himself to be outdone in generosity.With the assurance that I will pray for all of you at Holy Mass, in Eucharistic Adoration and in my personal devotions, since you have decided to support my vocation financially and with your prayers out of love for Our Crucified Lord and the Holy Catholic Church. I promise - to the extent possible - to ask that a monthly Mass be celebrated in honor of the Most Holy Trinity in thanksgiving for the benefactors He has sent me and for the intentions of each one.God will not be outdone in generosity!Thank you very much!In Christ the King,Don José Armando Frias Magaña, seminarian of the Institute of Christ the King Souverain Priest.Read more

title: samuels year on the logos hope
Description: Today on my 22nd birthday I am launching a fundraiser to support my year aboard the Logos Hope.The Logos Hope is the world's largest floating library, containing Christian literature and more. It's mission is to share the love of Christ all around the globe, through evangelisation, disaster relief, community development and sports ministry just to cite a few.Join me along this journey and experience God's great work around the world !Your support will help :- Cover the initial travel costs, including insurance.- The full year on the ship and all outreach related expenses.- The ship's maintenance to allow it to continue the ministry.- Keeping my apartment in Strasbourg for when I return to continue my Master's degree in Architecture.Please consider giving and praying with me during this year,For more information about the Logos Hope :https://www.om.org/ships/50yearsTo Subscribe to my Newsletter :https://mailchi.mp/806f6b4b23c9/samuels-newsletterGod bless,Samuel.If you are having trouble donating, or wish to give monthly please contact me so I can provide you with Banking details.Read more

We need:5 people who would be willing to give a 1000 euro gift,10 people who would give 500 euros,25 people who would be willing to give 100 euros and50 people who would give 50 euros.Would you be willing to consider these categories in your giving?Read more

title: be part of new mayapurs restoration
Description: A lot has changed since our last GoFundMe campaign here in New Mayapur. The temple and property are in constant refreshment, new devotees decided to become a part of our community, and new projects are shaping a bright future for Srila Prabhupada's home in the center of France .Thanks to your generous donations, we fixed the chapel's roof, which was badly damaged and in need of repair. This side of the castle is now safe, and protected from any further damage. However, another side of the castle's roof, above the main entrance, now has to be renovated urgently. Mold has built up badly on the walls due to a strong leakage, and one chimney will have to be taken down for security reasons. As you all know, this castle has been bought personally by H.D.G Srila A.C Bhaktivedanta Swami Prabhupada, as he made the first down payment to the former owner, almost fifty years ago. New Mayapur is now a tirtha for all of his followers, and we are trying our best to maintain this sacred place up to the standard it ought to be.We deeply thank your steady support towards New Mayapur, and are glad to be part of this wonderful project. All together, we can make a difference and change the future of ISKCON in France. Every little bit helps!Read more

title: evangelism bootcamp cfan manuel janna
Description: (Deutsch unten)Dieu a parlé clairement 3 fois et nous avons planifié une PROCHAINE ÉTAPE cet été pour suivre la vision de Dieu: équiper et envoyer des évangélistes et des Multiplicateurs ! Regardez la vidéo en français pour en savoir plus!Au travers de vos dons nous seront capable de payer le reste du budget de cet formation et du voyage. Ce budget inclus les frais de scolarité de cette formation intensive avec le ministère de Daniel Kolenda (Site Web de la formation)et un voyage missionnaire de 3 Semaines en Afrique. (campagnes d'évangélisation de masses où plusieurs centaines de milliers de personnes seront sauvées)Voici une vidéo en Anglais de l'école: Video FormationVoici une Vidéo récapitulative du voyage en Afrique: Video Voyage AfriqueSi tu souhaite recevoir nos actualités par mail durant notre voyage, inscris toi par ce lien: Lettre de nouvelles FrancaisMerci pour votre SoutiensTogether we plant.Manuel & Janna ReichörDEUTSCH:Gott hat dreimal klar gesprochen und wir haben diesen Sommer einen NÄCHSTEN SCHRITT geplant, um Gottes Vision zu folgen: Evangelisten und Multiplikatoren auszurüsten und zu senden!Schau dir dieses Video auf deutsch an, um mehr zu erfahren!Durch deine Spende können wir den Rest des Budgets für diese Schulung und die Reise bezahlen. Dieses Budget beinhaltet die Studiengebühren für dieses intensive Training mit dem Dienst von Daniel Kolenda (Webseite) und eine 3-wöchige Missionsreise nach Afrika. (Massenevangelisationen, bei denen mehrere Hunderttausend Menschen gerettet werden)Hier ist ein Video in Englisch von der Schulung: Video BootcampHier ist ein zusammenfassendes Video der Reise nach Afrika: Video AfrikareiseWenn du unsere Aktualitäten per Mail bekommen möchtest dann trage dich über diesen Link im Verteiler ein: Rundbrief DeutschDanke für deine UnterstützungTogether we plant !Manuel & Janna ReichörRead more

title: the french kellys
Description: Through 35 years of ministering in the UK, the Netherlands and France we have discovered time and again that when God restores, he gives more than before. We have a passion to see individuals, communities and nations experiencing the fulness of the restoration our loving creator has for us. Based in Normandy, France, we are working with a growing network of believers to see kingdom transformation – in this historic region and beyond.Since arriving in France in 2009, we have seen our ministry grow along four distinct but connected lines:- We are church-planting, nurturing a network of international, ecumenical, missional churches: fresh and innovative expressions of faith for a changing France.- We are working for social transformation in the city of Caen, initially through SOS Chai, a ministry amongst the city’s refugees.- We are supporting and encourage new business ventures through a Kingdom Business Network.- We are developing innovative teaching and training materials exploring church, mission and vocation.There is a powerful moment in the progress of every self-built housing project. It is when the ground has been marked out and the foundations built. Perhaps the concrete slab has been laid with all the conduits in place for wiring and plumbing. Even without walls or roof, the owner / builder can walk around the virtual rooms, imagining where everything will be. Here will be the kitchen with a view of the garden. Here the bedroom with its balcony…This is the moment we have reached in our French adventure. God has given us the foundations – for church; for transformation; for impact on multiple lives. Our goal is to spend the next ten years building on these foundations: to invest in the extraordinary people God is bringing to us and, through them, to see something beautiful established in the landscape of France.Our work in France is supported by an amazing community of regular donors in the UK, France, the Netherlands and the USA. Your partnership with us will bear measurable fruit in an innovative mission setting. You can be part of a new future for the nation of France!Read more

title: reconstruction de la mosque de kankalab
Description: Salam Aleykoum,Nous faisons appel à votre générosité pour la reconstruction et l'agrandissement de la mosquée historique  de Kankalabe (Dalaba).La mosquée de Kankalabé fut créée vers 1600. À l'époque, elle était en terre battue couverte de pailles. La mosquée de Kankalabé fut inaugurée la première et devient la première à abriter une prière de vendredi dans le foutah : un patrimoine historique.Elle a connu de multiples transformation. D'abord, sur la colline en allant vers Djarel puis transférée à Digan avant d'être à son lieu actuel (Missidé). La dernière vraie rénovation de la mosquée date de plusieurs années et aujourd'hui elle présente de nombreuses dégradations qui la mettent en péril.D'après 'Omar Ibn Al Khatab (qu'Allah l'agrée), le Prophète (que la prière d'Allah et Son salut soient sur lui) a dit:« Celui qui construit une mosquée dans laquelle on fait le rappel du nom d'Allah (*), Allah lui construit une maison au paradis »A votre bon coeurRead more

title: Aider essono a aider les plus dmunis

title: aider chelsy construire son ministre
Description: Je souhaite récolter cette somme pour réaliser les plans de Dieu dans ma vie, mais aussi pour qu'à travers ma vie d'autres gens puissent réaliser les plans et les projets de Dieu dans leurs vies.J'utiliserai ces fonds pour m'instruire dans une école certifiée, et pour faire bénéficier à d'autres personnes qui souhaitent faire la même chose que moi.Je dois récolter ces fonds avant la moitié du mois de décembre , et si vous sentez dans votre coeur de donner, je vous serais reconnaissante non seulement pour moi mais pour toutes les personnes que Dieu va sauver à travers ma vie grâce à vous ! Aidez-moi à gagner pour le Seigneur Jésus des milliers de vies !Read more

title: ywam paris connect
Description: Dear Friends and Family,I hope you are all doing well and have had a great start to the new year!As many of you know, due to updates on Facebook, Instagram, and my blog www.packingwithpatton.edu, I have been in France for a while now. I arrived safely and without trouble on January 8th.During the first few days, I was able to explore the city and see the Eiffel Tower. It was so beautiful and a lot bigger than I thought it would be.During the first two weeks of the lecture, we covered the topics "Hearing God's Voice" and "God's Nature and Character." It has been so fun to learn and grow in a Christian community, surrounded by people trying to help me develop my own identity in Christ.Along with lectures on Monday-Friday, I have daily morning and evening work duties during the week. Every morning, the people living in the house rotate through different chores. Then in the evening, I lead the lunch dishes crew. Typically we always have lunch and dinner together, other than the weekends, when we can explore the city. However, that has been kind of difficult due to COVID. All the museums and restaurants are still closed here, and there is a 6 PM curfew every night, so I haven't been able to see the Eiffel Tower all lit up yet. Hopefully someday soon!Along with an update, I wanted to reiterate my gratitude for all the prayers, donations, and kind words I have received while preparing for this trip and while I have been here. I am overwhelmed with love and support.As many of you know, I have been fundraising for a while now, and I truly believe God will meet my needs and provide the means for me to grow in Him and do His work. While I have completely paid for my lecture phase, which includes learning material, meals, and a place to live, I still have to pay the outreach phase's cost. As this cost is due by the end of February, I will continue to fundraise until then. No gift is too small, and all are much appreciated!I look forward to seeing what other amazing things God has in store for me. Thank you for investing, whether through prayer or donations!Love,Hannah PattonChecks can be made out to me; please send to:12667 Oakview Heights Drive, Story City, Iowa 50248https://www.ywamparisconnect.com/schools/backpackers-dts/Read more

title: la garde meurt mais ne se rend pas
Description: Bonsoir à tous,À l'heure où une crise Sanitaire sans précédent frappe la France mais pas seulement et où le laïcisme place de plus en plus fermement son pied dans l'entrebaillement de la porte de notre Devise Républicaine, j'ai, après mûre réflexion, décidé de me lancer dans un projet Solidaire mêlant volontiers les domaines Cultuel, Culturel ou encore Fraternel.Mais comme dit l'adage : "Tout seul on va plus vite, ensemble, on va plus loin."Car j'observe que depuis des années, les différentes démarches concernant la Spiritualité sont majoritairement en rapport avec les Convictions du ou des des décideuses-rs.Humblement et Modestement, je souhaiterais qu'Ensemble nous allionsà contre-courant de cette Philosophie en contribuant à Aider la Communauté Chrétienne mais pas seulement.Car les Amoureux de la Ville de Marseille le Savent, la Basilique Notre-Dame de la Garde a depuis Bien longtemps dépassé le cadre instauré par les Religions ou courants Philosophiques pratiqués et fait partie intégrante du Patrimoine Culturel de cette Grande Ville Française.Les paramètres cités ci-dessus n'étant d'ailleurs pas incompatibles pour des personnes dotées d'une ouverture d'Esprit.Je souhaiterais donc que nous apportions Ensemble notre Modeste et Humble contribution à la sauvegarde de cet Édifice en grand danger financier et infrastructurel.La crise Sanitaire engendrant en effet des pertes pécuniaires hebdomadaires à hauteur de 1700 € empêchant par conséquent les rénovations nécessaires.Personnellement, ce projet me tient particulièrement à Cœur car les personnes qui m'Aiment Connaissent mon Attachement pour la Cité Phocéenne et en tant que personne de Confession Musulmane œuvrant pendant le Mois Sacré de Ramadan, cette action joint à mes yeux l'Utile à l'agréable, l'un de mes leitmotivs.Clin d'œil Musical mais pas seulement, ce projet se nomme "La Garde meurt mais ne se rend pas." en référence à un Titre Chanté par deux Frères icônes du Rap Marseillais (une autre de mes passions), Faf Larage & Shurik'n.Enfin et vous Remerciant par avance pour l'intérêt que vous porterez à la Lecture de ce descriptif et de l'action qui en découle, je vous informe que je serais on ne Peut plus Transparent sur la suite qui sera donnée à cette Aventure Commune et que je remettrais personnellement au Recteur de la Basilique lors de mon prochain voyage en Terre Marseillaise (financé encore et toujours par Ouigo ), j'Espère, le chèque correspondant à la somme récoltée.Tout Don Monothéiste, Polythéiste, Philosophique, Agnostique ou encore Athée de quelques montants que ce soit ainsi que l'usage des nombreux moyens de Communication existants afin de Partager l'information sont les Bienvenus.Prenez soin de vous et soyez Heureux.Fraternellement,'Issa (Vincent)Read more

title: film santo daime
Description: Un long métrage pour présenter au Monde la Doctrine du Santo Daime et le pouvoir de son sacrement, voici le but de cette campagne.Avec le documentaire présenté ici nous avons déjà une base solide et un fil conducteur pour produire un superbe film riche et palpitant.Grâce à Claude Bauchet qui est en ligne de front de cette grande bataille pour la légalisation de Santo Daime nous acceptons le défi de tirer le voile, et de montrer au grand jour la véritable puissance de cette pratique.Nous proposons ce financement participatif afin d’accomplir les actions suivantes liés au développement du film « Viva a Liberdade do Santo Daime »:-    Écrire l’ensemble des textes de présentation (note d’intention, pitch, synopsis, note de production) mis en page dans un beau pdf / site internet ;-    Finir le documentaire ici présenté (voir lien dans la page) afin de montrer un exemple plus concret du potentiel du film ; même si celui-ci sera différent.-    Établir un chronogramme de production prévisionnel;-    Établir un budget prévisionnel du film ;-    Écrire un scénario indiquant les bases à suivre pour les tournages : fiction de la scène où les policiers envahissent la maison de Claude, définir les pays dans lesquels il faut se rendre pour interviewer d’autres personnes clés pour le film, quels autres aspects du Santo Daime il faut aborder et comment mieux parler de la légalisation, etc.-    Boucler toutes les bases de la bible de production, la mettre en page, l’illustrer ;-    Nous devrons voyager pour faire des repérages des endroits à filmer afin d’écrire correctement le scénario, rencontrer les personnes, voir sur place la réalité avant d’arriver avec une équipe de tournage ;-    Il faut également tourner quelques témoignages complémentaires immédiatement. En effet, nous avons besoin d’enrichir le présent documentaire - qui fait aussi office de teaser - avec d’autres aspects du film (anthropologie, tradition, quotidien des intégrants du Santo Daime avec courts témoignages de nouveau pratiquants, montrer la situation autour de la légalisation dans d’autres pays en dehors de la France, visiter un laboratoire et interviewer des scientifiques spécialistes de l’Ayahuasca, collecter des images diverses pendant les repérages afin d’enrichir le teaser)-    Contacter le réseau d’amis liés au cinéma et aux finances au sein du Santo Daime et de l’Ayahuasca pour mieux avancer la production du film, en exploitant toutes les portes possibles vers un financement et une diffusion solides.Nous proposons un film que nous voulons vu par le monde entier, possiblement sur une plateforme telle que Netflix où AmazonPrime, vu dans les festivals de cinéma internationaux et qui sait, le sortir en salle ?C’est un film destiné au grand public.PETERSON ALMEIDA :Diplômé d’un Master en cinéma-réalisation à l’Université de Paris VIII, Peterson est Réalisateur et Chef Monteur confirmé dans le marché du documentaire international. title: andrian mission through football
Description: Hi,My name is Andrian.In January 2021 i began to say The Gospel to young people in Moldova, aged 14-19,  using football.I created a team of 15 young amateurs and we were discussing about Christ during the weekly trainings we had, also building friendships with them.We also participated in a Christian football tournament and won it.Now, my dream is to increase our impact into society, because i really believe that this tool, football, can be used to change the lives of young people and further the whole nation through them.In this regard, i want to have two weekly trainings, to strengthen relations with the team and to talk more about God.Further, to register the team into National Minifootball Championship, thus ensuring a national impact of our mission.The money will be used:to rent the training ground;to buy new sports forms and to print on them a Christian message;to pay the tournament participation fee for one year.I'll do all my best to show them Christ in my life and i believe that He will work with me, because 'we are workers with God', as Bible says.Thanks for your donations and prayers! title: help me go on a mission trip to guatemala
Description: Hello Friends and Family,This summer I have been given the opportunity to travel to Zacapa, Guatemala for two months with the Liberty University Spanish Institute (LUSI). I will be placed in a host home with a Guatemalan family and serve in an internship.LUSI has partnered with Hope of Life International (HoL) for the last 22 years, sending teams of LU students to serve in Guatemala for a summer. HoL, a large mission’s campus, works with rehabilitating malnourished children, provides education and medical support to Guatemalan families, builds homes and churches, and more.I will travel from my host home daily to work in an internship in an orphanage. As you may know, my major is Psychology with a concentration in Criminal Psychology and I am minoring in Spanish. I am on the Dean’s List three years in a row and have maintained a 4.0 GPA throughout college while working on campus and now a second job off campus to help provide for this trip. This experience will allow me to gain Spanish fluency, expand my cultural awareness and have a transformational encounter with Christ as I serve the impoverished people of rural Guatemala.In order for me to be part of this, I am committed to raise personal financial support. I trust that God will help me do this, and perhaps you can be part of His provision for me. While you may not be able to go to Guatemala yourself, your gift will have an eternal impact on lives there, as I am able to share Christ’s love while serving their needs through HoL. I need to raise $4,500 for my flights, room and board, and all other incidentals related to the trip. Please consider donating; your contribution will have an eternal impact!Mailing Option:Email me at [email redacted] for address!For checks: make it out to “LUSI” (and include “Maegan Kennerly” in the memo line)Let me know if you have any questions about the trip; I’d love to hear from you! For more information about the work I’ll be doing, visit www.liberty.edu/LUSI and www.hopeoflifeintl.org.God bless,Maegan KennerlyRead more

title: kenya nursing trip
Description: Hello! My name is Kaylene Cender and I am a junior nursing student at Liberty University. I have the opportunity of traveling to Nairobi, Kenya this spring break, March 10th-22nd 2022, to complete my pediatric clinicals and offer time, service, and medical care to the children of the orphanage and the people in the city of Nairobi.We will be working with Happy Life, a hospital and orphanage that serves abandoned children by taking them off the streets and giving them a home, education, and opportunities for the future (https://happylifemission.org/). We will also be partnering with local churches in the area and running clinics to offer free medical care. Additionally, we are bringing over medical and school supplies, clothes, books, and gifts to donate to the school, orphanage, and hospital.I am incredibly excited for this experience and would love to ask for you and your family to partner with me in the furtherance of the Gospel and the support of our brothers and sisters overseas. Any financial support you are able to contribute would be so appreciated! If you are interested in hearing more about this specific trip or my long-term plans to share the Gospel overseas, please don’t hesitate to reach out to me.Read more

title: st peters building birthday boiler fund
Description: St. Peter's United Church of Christ has served Cincinnati's Pleasant Ridge neighborhood at our current site since it was organized in 1876. The church was built as a spiritual community for German immigrants and moved into our current building in 1922.  For 100 years our building has been a hub for the community. In the past year alone, we have hosted piano recitals, Pinewood Derby for a chapter of the Boy Scouts, a SURJ (Standing Up for Racial Justice) film viewing, community discussions on race, and social justice, LGBTQIA issues, creative arts workshops, and the like. We even host music lessons daily (Monday-Friday) in the sanctuary. St. Peter's is a proud community partner and it is our prayer that we continue to serve as a resource for the neighborhood as we find new and creative opportunities to use our space in non-traditional "church" ways.In order to continue to serve our community we need donations to cover some repairs to our 100 year old building. Please consider donating to help us cover repairs to our boiler and increased heating costs during the winter months as we continue to serve our awesome community. Any amount contributed will be greatly appreciated; donors who give $100 or more by 1/31/2022 will receive a St. Peter's mug in March. Be Blessed and thank you for considering parting with us!Read more

title: long winters night
Description: The Albuquerque Friends Meeting (Quakers) provides limited support to our unhoused neighbors: primarily access to water and electricity to charge devices, along with a safe place to rest during the day, snacks and occasional availability of warm clothing or blankets (which we have in very limited supply).  As winter approaches, there are times when our unhoused neighbors face extreme and life threatening conditions:  cold, wind, hunger, and moisture.  They face a chronic need for adequate warm clothing, blankets, etc.  Occasionally, when extreme weather events occur, shelters are full and hotel vouchers through agencies are unavailable on short notice.  At least two individuals died during extreme weather events in Albuquerque last winter.  The Meeting seeks to develop a fund to purchase hotel vouchers and essential, life saving supplies, for emergency distribution this winter.  Similarly, we sometimes have the opportunity to support someone who is getting off the streets with essential supplies to furnish an apartment and basic needs.  This Go Fund Me campaign will provide a financial resource to meet such needs.  Since "pass through" funds cannot be accepted by the Meeting, the Sanctuary Task Force elected to start a separate "Go Fund Me" for these needs.  Unfortunately, donations are not tax exempt at this time.  Albuquerque Monthly Meeting will provide updates on this effort in monthly meetings for worship for business, as well as on our website (www.abqfriends.org) and Facebook page throughout the season.  \We invite you to consider a donation and share widely with your own network of family and friends!With gratitude to any and all who contribute to this campaign!  Read more

title: mission in perubuilding orphanages
Description: The book of James says in its chapter 1, verse 27 “Pure and undefiled religion in the sight of our God and Father is this: to visit orphans and widows in their distress, and to keep oneself unstained by the world.” The love of Christ has been deposited into our hearts; therefore, our responsibility is to demonstrate that love worldwide. With our foundation Amar-y-Yo, we strive to complete that mission. We are an organization whose goal is to serve and provide a better life for children in different countries around the world. We have a footprint in several countries, including El Salvador, the Dominican Republic, and Uganda. The work we have done in these countries has been nothing more than the grace of God moving for these children. We provide support to already established orphanages with food, games, and volunteers to serve these children. These children have been abandoned and left for nothing, but we want them to understand they are worth the effort and that their lives are priceless! We support these orphanages and children in their educational needs, their spiritual needs, and their emotional and physical needs. Not only do we support the orphanages, but we are focused on the children enjoying everything in life. From having games and contests with prizes to holding Bible studies with the children, we find it vital for them to enjoy all facets of life. There is nothing that brings more joy than seeing a young child celebrate breaking a pinata and the kids laughing and smiling, and them realizing in that moment that they can truly be happy. We have many goals for our orphanages, and this includes building our own orphanages and expanding to other countries. We want to build orphanages in El Salvador, the Dominican Republic, and Peru. We have our current mission which is in Peru. Our goal there is to establish an orphanage of our own there, where children can find a new purpose in life. We are collecting funds to begin a Bible school where our kids can study and find refuge, a new orphanage where they can be safe, and for all the costs that will come with bringing them the joy-filled life they deserve. Together, we can help serve and change the lives of many! Any donation helps, and we are grateful for the opportunity to demonstrate love and mercy to others. With your donation, you can send the same love and mercy to the less fortunate all around the world.“Learn to do good; Seek justice, Reprove the ruthless, Defend the orphan, Plead for the widow.” Isaiah 1:17 Read more

title: Change Alis Life
Description: السلام عليكم ورحمة الله وبركاتهThe Prophet ﷺ said, “Whosoever removes a worldly grief from a believer, Allah will remove from him one of his griefs on the day of judgement...” (Sahih Muslim)Dear Brothers and Sisters we desperately need your help to raise funds to help our Brother Ali in Somalia.Brother Ali is both mentally and physically disabled and lives in extreme poverty in a remote village in Somalia. After both, his parents passed away (may Allah have mercy on them), for OVER 20 YEARS his elderly sister (pictured below) has been taking care of him full time. Despite herself being ill she walks daily to bring water and looks after her brother in every way, a truly dire situation Subhan-Allah!Alhamdulillah, we have started collecting last week to help make life easier for them both. We have started to build his home and brought him a basic mattress to sleep on for now. See belowWith your help, we intend to:⏩ Build a brick house with two rooms for them to live in.⏩ Buy a wheelchair so Ali can be more independent and can be taken places (masjid etc...)⏩ Buy a water tank that can store and hold water for daily use.⏩ Sewage disposal system⏩ Food and basic necessitiesThis is where you can help. Please donate as much as you can to help Ali and his sister have a home and basic necessities.I hope that we see the results of our actions not just in this life but in the hereafter when we are alone in our graves and/or when we stand before our creator.Allah’s Messenger ﷺ said: “Charity does not decrease wealth...” (Ṣaḥīḥ Muslim 2588)جزاك الله خيرا✅ We know the family personally and can vouch that this is 100% Genuine✅ Zakat Applicable⏩ PLEASE SHAREFor more information or for verification purposes please feel free to get in touch.Read more

title: matthews pilgrimage to rome
Description: Howdy! My name is Matthew Deane, and while some of you may know me very well, I am hoping that this open letter will reach far and wide in order to reach my goal. That means that an introduction is in order!I am currently a first-year student at Texas A&M University but more importantly, I am a devout Catholic who has been very involved with the Catholic community there! I have had a blast getting to know the people at St. Mary’s and I have even been offered the opportunity to go on a pilgrimage with them to Rome this summer!That is where you come in. Rome is very far away and surprisingly, it costs a lot of money to travel to and stay in a foreign country! This would be the most amazing opportunity to build my faith and learn more about the history and heart of my beliefs. To walk where saints have walked and see the sights that have inspired millions. I cannot express how much it would change my life to be able to experience what I know this trip has to offer. It is a once-in-a-lifetime chance and I need your help to make it happen.I know it’s a lot to ask but any amount helps and it would seriously mean the world to me if you could donate anything towards this trip. My goal is to raise about $5000 and anything above and beyond that will go towards bringing something cool back for my mom so feel free to break that goal (if you won’t do it for me, do it for Inke!) Anything helps, and I’m sure that we can reach this goal before the summer.Thank you so much for even reading this and I hope to send frequent updates from Rome!Read more

Not only were we so excited for this opportunity but seeing how amazing God has been working and bringing our family full circle has been nothing short of miraculous.when Jessica arrived she began to feel ill. she woke in the middle of the night to extraordinary pain that landed her in and out of the hospital. One ovary is now completely gone and it is invading the other.She will be having open abdominal surgery Friday November 12th and have 6 weeks of recovery in DC. Her husband will be with her for that time so both of them will be out of work.We see God covering every single gap and we need your help. If you feel lead, please donate.Every dollar is going to food, after care and stay for them in a state that is not their home.This is going to be a very expensive recovery.thank you for your help. We love you.Read more

title: gaudiya vedanta outreach travel sankirtan van
Description: Most of you reading this don’t need an introduction to Vasanti Dasi.  She has whole-heartedly served our Srila Gurudeva, Sri Srimad Bhaktivedanta Narayana Maharaja by being the assistant and right hand to our dear Srimati Syamarani didi.  She has helped on the publication of many his books, founded and runs the International Pure Bhakti Yoga Society Prison Program, the Gaudiya Vedanta Publication sponsorship program, and uses her Masters degree in social work to help devotees around the world, just to name a few of her multitude of devotional services. For many years, Vasanti had a Sprinter van that was her transportation and housing to visit prisons and festivals distributing Srila Gurudeva’s books and art around the United States.  Although she regularly maintained and serviced her Sprinter, in September on a trip back cross country from a color festival in Utah, her Sprinter’s engine blew a gasket.  She was forced to sell it for a small amount, and is now in a need for a new Gaudiya Vedanta Outreach festival and prison program vehicle. She did not want me to create this fundraiser, but a reliable, long-lasting, new, travel, camper by which she can continue this compassionate service for many years, is needed. No amount is too small, and every penny will be used toward the vehicle.  By contributing, you will literally be helping thousands of people become exposed to bhakti yoga.  As of this date, Vasanti and her team have placed our Gurudeva’s books in over 600 prison libraries.  It is really essential to reach out to all strata of soceity, from presidents to prisoners.  Vasanti has answered the call of Mahaprabhu….every town and village.  Please continue to be part of this yuga dharma by helping Vasanti continue.Read more

title: war disaster fund for the north central synod
Description: The North Central Ethiopian Synod is one of the earliest Synod of the Ethiopian Evangelical Church of Mekane Yesus. The Synod was a cause for massive disaster relief work and rural development projects the church has been implementing over the decades in the northern part of Ethiopia to save millions from starvation and improve the quality of life of people living the region. Many Mekane Yesus Churches and congregations are established in different areas of northern Ethiopia. Following the expansions of the congregations, community development out-reach programs such as agricultural extension program, health services were established to benefit the surrounding areas such as Afar, Tigray and Amhara regions. Improving rural agriculture and health through extension programs, providing medical care through hospitals and clinics, improving education through schools, hostels and child-care were among many important programs in this region.This war in the northern part of Ethiopia has been very difficult to comprehend. The war that was orchestrated by the TPLF has left dire damaging consequences on human lives, psychology, economy, properties and infrastructure. While the destruction in the three regions is very wide and deep, we have received a request from North Central Ethiopia Synod in which they gave the details of the extent of properties looted and destroyed. The total amount of dollar required to replace the stolen or destroyed electronic equipment, furniture, power generator, building restoration and others is $ 145, 323.00. We appeal to all people of good will to donate money so that the Area Synod could continue its evangelistic and social services to the people in the region.የሰሜን መካከለኛው ኢትዮጵያ ሲኖዶስ የኢትዮጵያ ወንጌላዊት መካነ ኢየሱስ ቤተክርስቲያን ቀደምት ሲኖዶስ አንዱ ነው። ሲኖዶሱ ከፍተኛ የአደጋ ድጋፍና የገጠር ልማት ስራዎችን በመስራት በሰሜን የኢትዮጵያ ክፍል ለሚሊዮን የሚቆጠር ህዝብን ከረሃብ ለመታደግ እና በክልሉ የሚኖሩ ህዝቦችን ህይወት ለማሻሻል ቤተክርስቲያኗ ባለፉት አስርተ አመታት ስታከናዉናቸዉ ኖራለች። በሰሜን ኢትዮጵያ የተለያዩ አካባቢዎች በርካታ የመካነ ኢየሱስ አብያተ ክርስቲያናት እና ጉባኤያት ተቋቁመዋል። የማኅበረ ቅዱሳንን መስፋፋት ተከትሎ የህብረተሰቡን የልማት ተጠቃሚነት መርሃ ግብሮች ማለትም የግብርና ኤክስቴንሽን መርሃ ግብር፣ የጤና አገልግሎትን የመሳሰሉ አካባቢዎችን እንደ አፋር፣ ትግራይ እና አማራ ክልሎች ተጠቃሚ ለማድረግ ተቋቁሟል። የገጠር ግብርናና ጤናን በኤክስቴንሽን መርሃ ግብሮች ማሻሻል፣ በሆስፒታሎች እና ክሊኒኮች የህክምና አገልግሎት መስጠት፣ በትምህርት ቤቶች፣ ሆስቴሎች እና የህፃናት እንክብካቤን ማሻሻል በዚህ ክልል ውስጥ ካሉ በርካታ ጠቃሚ ፕሮግራሞች መካከል ይጠቀሳሉ።በሰሜናዊው የኢትዮጵያ ክፍል የተደረገውን ጦርነት ለመረዳት አስቸጋሪ ነበር። በህወሓት የተቀነባበረ ጦርነት በሰው ህይወት፣ በስነ ልቦና፣ በኢኮኖሚ፣ በንብረትና በመሰረተ ልማት ላይ አስከፊ መዘዝ አስከትሏል። በሦስቱ ክልሎች የደረሰው ውድመት እጅግ ሰፊና ጥልቅ ቢሆንም የተዘረፉና የወደሙ ንብረቶችን መጠን በተመለከተ ከሰሜን መካከለኛው ኢትዮጵያ ሲኖዶስ የቀረበ ጥያቄ ደርሶናል። የተሰረቁትን ወይም የተበላሹትን የኤሌክትሮኒክስ ዕቃዎችን፣ የቤት ዕቃዎችን፣ የኃይል ማመንጫዎችን፣ የሕንፃ እድሳትን እና ሌሎችን ለመተካት የሚያስፈልገው ጠቅላላ የዶላር መጠን 145, 323.00 ዶላር ነው። የአካባቢው ሲኖዶስ ለክልሉ ህዝብ እያከናወነ ያለውን የስብከተ ወንጌልና የማህበራዊ አገልግሎት አጠናክሮ እንዲቀጥል በጎ ፈቃድ ያላችሁ ወገኖች በሙሉ የገንዘብ ልገሳውን እባካችሁ አድርጉልን እናቋቁማቸው::Read more

title: send garron to the holy land
Description: Hey all!So I have exciting news that I will be going to the Holy Land in July of 2022 to take a ministry formation course at St George's College in Jerusalem.Most of the central part of the course is luckily covered in cost by my Seminary, but other costs will come with travel and the like and things I may want to do while in Jerusalem.Being in Seminary and trying to prepare for the following stages of my life outside of Seminary means I'm trying to save as much money as possible. So the less I have to spend on this trip, the better. I would love all of your support and appreciate it immensely! Read more

title: help christy buy ddembe house for her 50th
Description: I’m turning 50 next Monday!!! This feels so BIG and so hard to believe!As I was reflecting over my life and the things that were most important to me, one of the greatest joys of my life has been the ministry we started in Uganda – Ddembe Ministries! It fills my cup to overflowing!Ddembe Ministries has grown to the place where we are turning it into a 501(c)(3) this year! This labor of love is the little engine that could!Ddembe now has the opportunity to purchase the house we have been renting since we started the ministry. We've made countless renovations to this property and it would be the perfect place to have a permanent home base for the ministry as it continues to grow. I told my family, “I want to ask my friends to help us buy the house for my 50th bday!!”The cost of the house and property is $74,000, but I bet we can raise $50,000 for my 50th, right? This is SO DOABLE!If50 friends gave $1,000Or100 gave $500Or1,000 friends gave $50OrAnything in between!Any of these ways could buy the house!If all my friends help me buy this fantastic house in Uganda for vulnerable children, orphans, and widows, I can’t think of a more thrilling way to celebrate my half-century mark on planet earth!!Love you all!! So excited for 50!Read more

title: evies and her dads mexico mission trip
Description: Hi there, my name is Evie Hinz and I am 15 years old. I am raising money for my dad and I to go on a mission trip to Puerto Penasco, Mexico this March (11th - 19th) with my grandfather. On the mission trip our team will build a home for a family who are presently living in a home made of pallets, cardboard and discarded items. We are going with other youth and adults from Medicine Lodge KS United Methodist Church. The money that I raise will help with me and my dad's travel expenses (approx. $1000) to Puerto Penasco and the rest will go to equipment and supplies to build the house. This will be my first mission trip with my dad and probably the last mission trip for my grandfather who has led at least eight mission trips to Mexico in the past. Through this I want to grow in my faith as a Christian, share and spread God's love. Most importantly I want to show those out there in the world that you can change someone's life and make a difference for the good. I hope you will help! I will greatly appreciate it as will the people in Mexico awaiting us. I'll be sure to post lots of pictures during our mission trip. Thank you for any help you can give.Read more

title: appel au don pour mon papa atteint dun cancer
Description: [FRENCH] Assalamu Aleykum,Je m'appelle Assia, certains d'entre vous me connaissent personnellement ou m'ont peut-être découverte sur ma page Instagram, The Mizaan , où je partage mon amour pour notre belle religion qu'est l'Islam avec une incroyable communauté de femmes musulmanes de tout horizon. J'y écris mes pensées, mes conseils pour vivre un style de vie islamique équilibré et apaisant, fondé sur les précieux enseignements de notre cher Prophète Muhammad ﷺ ainsi que les lois du Plus Grand.Ces derniers nous invitent à mettre de côté notre fierté et à faire appel à la Ummah lorsque nous sommes dans le besoin, et alors que j'ai toujours eu à coeur de résoudre mes problèmes en ne demandant de l'aide qu'à Allah ﷻ et en travaillant dur, je me rends compte aujourd'hui qu'il faut aussi savoir demander du soutien à ses frères et soeurs fiLlah qui font souvent preuve d'une générosité exemplaire, et leur offrir une opportunité de réaliser une belle Sadaqah.Il y a un petit peu plus d'un an, mon Papa a débuté son combat contre un cancer métastatique localisé dans le bas du poumon et qui s'est ensuite développé dans ses intestins et son foie. Ces dernières semaines, son état de santé s'est beaucoup dégradé, et bien qu'Allah ﷻ est capable de tout, l'inquiétude règne au sein de ma famille.Nous savons combien il est important de ne pas emporter ses dettes avec soi en Islam. C'est un lourd fardeau pour mon Papa que j'aimerais pouvoir lui retirer, mais malheureusement la situation financière de ma famille ne me le permet actuellement pas. Seules ma Maman et moi-même percevons des revenus à l'heure actuelle, et étant moi-même endettée, il est devenu difficile pour nous de tout gérer.C'est pour quoi je fais appel à vous, à votre générosité et à vos prières, afin que mon Papa puisse vivre cette épreuve en n'ayant plus à s'inquiéter de ses dettes. Qu'Allah ﷻ accorde al Shifa à toutes les personnes malades, protège ceux qui vont sont chers et vous comble de bienfaits dans cette dunya et dans al Akhirah. Jazakum Allah KheirAssia[ENGLISH] Assalamu Aleykum,My name's Assia, some of you know me personally or may have discovered me on my Instagram page, The Mizaan , where I share my love for our beautiful religion with an incredible community of Muslim women from all around the world. The account has become a safe space where I write my thoughts, my tips and advice for living a balanced Islamic lifestyle, based on the precious teachings of our dear Prophet Muhammad ﷺ as well as the laws of The Greatest.The latter invite us to put aside our pride and call upon the Ummah when we are in need, and while I have always made it a point to solve my problems by only asking Allah ﷻ for help and working hard, I now realise that I should also know how to ask for support from my brothers and sisters in Islam who often show beautiful generosity, and offer them an opportunity to make a meaningful Sadaqah.A little over a year ago, my Dad began his battle with metastatic cancer in his lower lung, which then spread to his intestines and liver. Over the last few weeks, his health has deteriorated significantly, and although Allah ﷻ is capable of anything, my family and I are worried.We know how important it is not to carry your debts with you in Islam. It has been a heavy burden on my Dad that I wish I could take away from him, but unfortunately my family's financial situation does not allow me to do so. Only my Mum and I have are earning money at the moment, and being in debt myself, it has become difficult for us to manage everything.That is why I am calling for your help, your generosity and prayers, so that my Dad can go through this hardship without having to worry about his debts. May Allah ﷻ grant shifa to all those who are sick, protect those who are dear to you and shower you with blessings in this dunya and in al Akhirah. Jazakum Allah KheirAssiaRead more

title: tre auprs delle est des notres
Description: Salam, suite au décès de notre chère et tendre Mère, Belle mère, grand mère une femme pieuse douce et d'une lumière éclatante tant dans son visage que dans ses paroles et son comportement, notre peine est immenseElle va rejoindre sa dernière demeure chez elle dans son pays en Guadeloupe, là où elle a œuvré pour Dieu et le bien toute sa vie!Notre souhait bien évidemment et d'être à ses côtés pour l'accompagnerLe voyage étant coûteux et la famille nombreuse nous vous demandons de l'aide , même très peu pour nous aidez" Une graine de riz fait un sac de riz"Avec l'aide de Dieu in sha AllahRead more

title: les maons du cur aider un papa maison
Description: Bonjour tout le monde, je m'appelle Aurélie et j'aimerais venir en aide à mon frère et sa famille (deux enfants). Il s'est lancé dans un projet d'autoconstruction depuis décembre 2016. Projet, qu'il essaie de mener à bien comme il peut. Cependant, il a rencontré des soucis de santé en 2021, ce qui l'empêche de mener à bien son projet, tant sur le plan de la construction mais aussi financièrement. Ils habitent actuellement dans une partie de la maison mais elle commence malheureusement à se dégrader. Ainsi un coup de pouce serait le bienvenu pour accélérer les travaux.... Dans une attention bienveillante, je vous remercie d'avance pour l'aide que vous pourrez leur apporter...Même le plus petit don sera très utile... Amicalement, Aurélie.Read more

Description: Salut à tous ceux que je connais bien et les autres je connais personnellement une personne dans le besoin avec un enfant je demande jamais fait jamais de cagnotte vraiment si je demande c est qu’il y a urgencedonc je vais vous demander à tous de donner un petit quelques chose ou un gros si vous pouvez il faut seulement 500 euro pour rembourser une dette de loyer et surtout pouvoir se nourrir car là personne ne peux plus se nourrir ou nourrir son enfant biensur je vais être là première à donner pour ceux qui se posent la question même 1 euro je compte sur vous tous merci que dieu vous le rendent en 100000 fois merci à tous Read more

title: votre frre est pauvre il est une maladie rare
Description: Pour tous , aider votre frère bachirAidons notre frère BachirdC’est avec beaucoup d’émotions que je partage, ici, l’histoire de Bachir.Bachir est un père de famille atteint d’une maladie rare, déficit hémorragique constitutionnel en facteur II, il est arrivé en France en 2017 pour se faire soigner laissant derrière lui en Algérie sa famille : sa femme, ses 3 enfants, son entourage, ses proches...3 ans plus tard, il perd sa femme, novembre 2020, c’est un cancer généralisé qui l’emporte, loin de lui, ses enfants se retrouvent privés de leur mère.Bachir demeure à Toulouse, sans ressource, sans papier, sans droit mais maintenu .Un rêve qui revêt du droit humain le plus normal.Pour l’aider plusieurs options :1/ Partager cette requête au plus grand nombre de vos connaissances.2/ Cliquez sur le lien et laisser un don qui lui permettra d’avancer vers son rêve.3/ lui laisser un message de soutien. Les options sont évidemment cumulables! A vos grands cœurs et je suis sûre qu’il y en a beaucoup qui visitent ce mur.Si vous pouvez m'aider ou si vous connaissez des personnes qui pourraient m'aider, vous pouvez me contacter.Read more

title: aider adbullah bartir une petite maison
Description: Bonjour,Nous avons besoin de réunir des fonds pour financer la contruction d'une petite maison 4 pièces pour un jeune couple et leurs deux enfants sur la rive gauche à Louxor en Egypte.Leur dernier né est prématuré et nous avons deja financé le séjour à l'hopital lorsque nous y etions en Octobre dernier.Ils ont aussi une petite fille adorable de 3 ans.Actuellement, ils squattent chez la belle famille  et dorment par terre et cela ne peut pas durer.Le père, 30 ans,  je le connais depuis 10 ans. C'est un bosseur et il a un emploi, dans le tourisme,mais il lui faudrait 20 ans pour économiser les 10 000 euros necessairesAidez-nous à mettre un toit au dessus de la tête de cette jeune famille.Read more

title: vxd9c famille en dtresse
Description: BonjourNotre famille a été expulsé de sa maison à la veille de Noël par la mairie de Barjols.Pour faire simple, un arrêté de mise en péril a été décrété sur notre maison de village.Il s'avère que notre maison est la dernière d'une rue en pente et qu'une autre maison la soutenait avant que la mairie ne la détruise pour un parking. Les travaux de soutien ont été réduits et comportent des malfaçons.Bien sûr personne ne nous a informé.La mairie a dépêché en peut de temps 3 experts. Ces experts n'ont jamais fait mention des défauts de soutien, sauf le premier qui nous en a parlé.Les 2 autres ont été à charge contre nous.Nous avons peut de moyens.La mairie nous a laissé 30 mn pour réunir le minimum et sortir définitivement de notre maison.Elle nous a dit qu'elle prenait en charge les expertises (qu'elle a missionné sans nous avertir) et le notre relogement.Un policier municipal c'est présenté le lendemain pour nous faire signer un bail de location et une reconnaissance de dette de 8000€ pour les expertises.La mairie tente de nous écrasé pour éviter un scandale, la prise en charge de travaux titanesques et l'indemnisation de toute une rue.Nous avons besoin de fonds pour financer l'expertise des travaux de soutien et pour un avocat.On nous donne 1mois pour faire des travaux de sécurisation de toute la rue et de notre maison.Nous avons besoin d'aide.Merci.Read more

title: bnir les monniers
Description: Salut à toi :) !On à coeur de bénir Manu et Elia Monnier pour tout ce qu'ils ont fait pour nous et pour l'Eglise. Les Monniers sont impliqués dans l'église depuis plusieurs années mais ils ont particulierèment impacté et apporté aux jeunes à Clé. Si on veut particulièrement les bénir maintenant c'est parce qu'ils vont avoir un cinquième enfant très bientôt. On voudrait donc les bénir financièrement.L'objectif c'est de leur donner 1000e. Donnez comme vous pouvez et comme vous voulez, même si c'est seulement 5e ça serait top !On voudrait aussi leur donner une carte avec des mots d'encouragements et de remerciements. Vous pouvez envoyer ça à cette adresse mail : [email redacted] ou à ce numéro de téléphone : 0652777059.Merci pour votre participation !! Soyez BénisRead more

title: help tilly escape a very narcissistic environment
Description: Hello, my name is Tilly (using a nickname for privacy reasons) and I am currently living in a highly abusive and toxic narcissistic environment. To make a long story short, I am in the process of saving money so I can get out of there as soon as possible. My mother is unstable and highly narcissistic with hoarding tendencies and uses my brother and I for child support money by infantilizing us constantly. Here is a list of things she has done thus far:-Went through my brother and I's belongings and taken pictures (legal documents, alcohol, diaries, etc.)-Became enraged when confronted about it and flipped it on us-Silent treatments when not providing her with information she can use to control us-Stole my passport and ID and acted as if she was sorry for me that I 'lost' them-Constant demotivating speech when we are attempting to become independent (ex: getting a job or going to school)-Broke into both my safes with all my legal documents in it-Regularly going through my room when I am not there-Going through my receipts to track how much I am spending-Only person who has access to the mailbox key (no one else is allowed)-Reading through my diary regularly-Making us feel like financial burdens-Refuses to give my brother and I the minimum required amount of child support-Purposefully detaining information regarding child support-Excessive hoarding of clothes, groceries, furniture using the child support money that has taken over 90% of the apartment (one shower is completely unusable because it is filled with boxes, and my brother's room is filled with boxes as well)-Does not want to give us money to buy groceries (she does it for us instead using the child support money)-Poor apartment upkeep (refuses to spend money to fix broken utilities)-Absolutely no privacy or boundaries (she currently sleeps and changes herself in the living room)-Going through my brother and I's mail-Not respecting our boundaries despite asking her not to several times-Being very judgemental and shaming us of any signs of adulthood coming from my brother and I (ex: drinking, sexuality, going out late at night, smoking, etc.)-Shit-talking about me in the room next to me just so I can hear it-Telling me who to date or be friends with and what to do-Gaslighting, minimizing, covert attention-seeking, low empathy-Constant denial of her abusive behavior when confronted about it& moreSome photos for proof:Crowded hallwayTable full of stuffUnusable showerHoarding room (excuse the bad quality)Brother's room filled with boxes (bad quality again)There is more to this story than presented here, but I do not wanna give out more personal info. The 10000 euros would help me cover rent for a couple months, as well as get a lawyer for the child support. I am going back to school soon and would like to finally escape this hell that I have been living in since I was born into this family. Any amount of money helps, and if you can't, sharing this gofundme link helps too. Thank you so much for taking the time to read this.Read more

title: une maman au cur dchir
Description: Une mère a été délibérément arrachée à ses 3 enfants, dont deux en bas âges (1 an et 2 ans), par la l’injustice française qui l’a condamnée à 6 ans de prison sans preuves ni témoignages recevables loin de ses bébés.Sa vie n’a plus aucun sens sans ses enfants, et la leur encore moins sans leur maman, ils la pleurent et la recherchent sans cesse, ils sont toute sa vie.Nul ne peut remplacer une maman!!Alors aidez nous à faire en sorte qu’ils se retrouvent au plus vite, en donnant ce que vous pouvez, pour pouvoir lui payer un bon avocat au plus vite.Merci d’avance à tout ceux qui auront été touché  et qui donneront ce qu’ils pourront.Read more

title: aidez lison sortir de lenfer
Description: Bonjour , je m'appelle Céline et je collecte des fonds pour permettre à ma petite fille de ne plus subir le quotidien qu'on lui impose depuis 2 ans . Pour faire valoir ses droits et convaincre la justice qu'il est urgent , pour son bien être , de retrouver sa place à mes côtés...  Je dois absolument avoir recours à un avocat aux honoraires qu'il m'est actuellement impossible d'honorer ( l'aide juridictionnelle m'ayant été refusée ) . Ma petite fille , que j'ai élevée seule durant ses 6 premières années , est entrain de supporter ce qu'elle n'aurait jamais dû connaître ..  Les plaintes se succèdent et un signalement est en cours , mais ma situation économique actuelle ( mise volontairement a mal par son père ) m'empêche de faire appel à un avocat capable de se mobiliser et de se battre pour notre cause ...C'est un véritable appel au secours ...  Vous me semblez être la dernière solution face à un combat que je tente de mener seule depuis 2 ans ...  Parce que je me dois de tout tenter pour sortir ma fille de cet enfer ... Read more

title: making this an amazing christmas
Description: Hi friends and family,It's me, Cathy! and I want to tell you about the children of "Angeles de Los Arenales" in Peru.Angeles (which means angels in the sandbanks) is an association that helps children who are affected by cancer and leukemia access treatment, medicines as well as basic supplies needed to live and overcome this sickness.This association cares for over 600 children who in many cases also come from low-income families, therefore the help and care they provide is essential towards helping these children have an opportunity to heal.Every year a big Christmas party is planned, this is a very joyful event where the children all receive presents and have a lot of fun, some of the little ones are receiving presents for the first time because of their lack of the poverty affecting them.This year the big event will take place on December 17!!!For several years now, I have collaborated with Maria Teresa Dulanto ( who leads Angeles de los Arenales) by donating presents for these 600 wonderful children. I do believe that having a wonderful, carefree Christmas is a true gift for the children, a wonderful Christmas where they can play, dance, be covered in gifts, and live the life every child deserves....And that's why I created this fund, to also give others the possibility to collaborate with this initiative who will fill the heart of many children with joy!We don't know what tomorrow brings, but today is a great opportunity to chip in to make something beautiful!******If you'd like to help me on this quest, here is what will happen:1. The fund will be open until December 12, 2021, and you can make a donation until then ( There is no minimum nor maximum! Anything is already amazing!)2. I will then withdraw the funds to transfer them to my aunt who is in Lima will buy the presents3. All of our little helpers will receive all the information regarding the gifts as well as pictures of everything we were able to get with the children.4. We will drop off the gifts at the association for the big Christmas party that takes place on December 17!!5. We"ll then be able to enjoy the pictures and videos of the children enjoying their gifts at the partyLearn more about the association here:https://www.facebook.com/angelesdelosarenales/If you are living in Peru then it might be easier for you toMake a donation directly to the association ANGELES DE LOS ARENALES. Below the bank details: SCOTIABANK ACCOUNT 0767173344 Dirección Dionisio Derteano 102 San Isidro Lima 27 Perú Swift : BSUDPEPL 3)Or you can also:Drop off your presents for the kids directly to : ANGELES DE LOS ARENALES ATTE: Maria Teresa Dulanto Guinea Calle Banda Rivera 211 Apartamento 301 Urbanización Aurora Miraflores Lima PerúThank you so much!!!Love,CathyRead more

title: sauvez pitchounette
Description: (English Below)Bonjour à vous,Aujourd’hui je viens vers vous pour solliciter votre aide.C'est le dernier mois pour sauver Pitchounette.Ma grand-mère est atteinte d’Alzheimer et elle est sous tutelle. Pitchounette est sa maison. Elle est située à La Londe les Maures, dans le Var.Son tuteur a décidé de mettre en vente sa maison, sa maison de cœur, sa maison qu’elle chérie, la maison que mon grand-père à fait lui-même, un bout de leurs âmes.L’Alzheimer de ma grand-mère étant très prononcé, le tuteur veut vendre la maison pour pouvoir payer son Ehpad spécialisée dans les maladies dégénératives.Le délai pour me positionner pour l’achat est très rapide. Il y a donc une urgence pour nous à trouver des solutions efficaces et viables pour conserver la maison au sein de notre famille.En effet, j’aimerais pouvoir garder la maison jusqu’à la fin de la vie de ma grand-mère pour pouvoir l’y amener le plus souvent possible.C’est une maison que j’ai aidé à construire avec mon seau en plastique et ma micro pelle, vêtue d'une couche et marchant à quatre pattes.Cette maison où nous avons grandi, passé 3 mois minimum par an. Cette maison où mon grand-père s’est acharné, endetté et épuisé. Il est parti il y a 34 ans rejoindre les étoiles mais son âme vit à jamais dans cette maison.C’est une maison qui nous tient à cœur, à mon frère et à moi, et nous aimerions vraiment la garder et la rénover. Nous pouvons accueillir un minimum de 10 personnes en même temps : 6 lits en dortoir, et 2 chambres doubles. (Nous avons quelques matelas en plus à mettre au sol et un canapé)Le but à terme est d’en faire un lieu de rencontres, un lieu de partage, un lieu de retraite, un lieu de soin, un lieu de vacances, un lieu autonome en énergie, un lieu d’accueil pour la co-création.Nous aimerions pouvoir y accueillir des familles avec leurs enfants qui courent dans le jardin pour chercher des œufs de Pâques, qui viennent au bord de la cheminéeun instant de Noël, qui viennent se dorer la pillule au bord de la belle bleue.Des travaux par la suite seront envisagés grâce aux amis ouvriers et à nos petits bras. L’idée est de faire de Pitchounette un lieu éco-responsable, une maison qui puisse fournir son électricité, sa nourriture, récupérer son eau grise.... une maison auto-suffisante.Pour le moment le but n’est pas de recueillir la somme nécessaire pour ces rénovations, mais déjà de garder Pitchounette. Que ma grand-mère puisse y aller avec nous dès que nous avons des temps libres pour pouvoir passer du temps ensemble, dans un lieu qu’elle reconnaitra peut-être, vu l’amour qu’elle lui porte, dans un lieu qui est un bout d’elle et de son mari, dans un lieu non aseptisé et plein de vie, d’amour et de rires.Nous avions besoin d’essayer, de faire tout ce qui est en notre pouvoir pour ce souvenir, cet amour de la belle Pitchounette.J’aimerais vous fournir plus d’images, malheureusement Pitchounette est à 5h de mon lieu de vie, et les portes sont fermées pour le moment. Je vous les rajoute dès que je peux.Merci de m’avoir lue, merci de votre contribution aussi petite soit-elle.Je voudrais ainsi vous proposer des échanges. Venez passer un jour, une semaine ou un mois sur notre belle côte d’azur, en participant à un projet au cœur d’une famille.Au plaisir de partager le thé avec vous à Pitchounette.Découvrez des photos de La Londe:http://www.la-londe-cote-azur.fr/photos.htmSi vous souhaitez participer par paypal voici le lien: [email redacted]I there, Today I'm asking for your help. Last month to save Pitchounette. My grandmother has Alzheimer's and is under guardianship. Pitchounette is her home.   Her guardian decided to put up for sale her home, her heart, her home that she cherishes, the house that my grandfather made himself, a piece of their souls. My grandmother's Alzheimer being very pronounced, the guardian wants to sell the house to be able to pay for a specialized house in degenerative diseases.  The deadline to purchase this house is very fast. It is therefore urgent for us to find effective and viable solutions to keep the house within our family.  Indeed, I would like to be able to keep it until the end of her life to be able to bring her there as often as possible. It is a house that I helped build with my plastic bucket and my micro-shovel, wearing my diaper when I was 2 years old. This is a house where we grew up, spending a minimum of 3 months a year. This house where my grandfather toiled, got into debt and exhausted himself. He left 34 years ago to join the stars but his soul lives forever in this house.  It is a house that my brother and I hold dear to our hearts, despite all the repairs that need to be done, we would really like to keep it and restore it.We can accommodate a minimum of 10 people at a time: 6 beds in a dormitory, and 2 double rooms. (We have a few extra mattresses to put on the floor and a sofa) The long-term goal is to make it a meeting place, a place of sharing, a place of retreat, a place of care, a place of vacation, an autonomous place in energy and a place for co-creation.  We would like to be able to welcome families who run in the garden to look for Easter eggs, who come to the edge of the fire for a moment of Christmas, who come to bask in the sun on the edge of the beautiful blue.  Later on, we will work on the project with the help of our friends and our little hands. The idea is to make Pitchounette an eco-responsible place, a house that can provide its electricity, its food, recover its grey water.... a self-sufficient house.  For the moment the goal is not to collect the necessary amount of money for these renovations, but already to keep Pitchounette. That my grandmother can go with us as soon as we have free time to spend time together, in a place that she might recognize, given the love she has for her, in a place that is a piece of her and her husband, in a place that is not sanitized and full of life, love and laughter.   We needed to try, to do everything in our power for this memory, this love of the beautiful Pitchounette.   I would like to provide you with more pictures, unfortunately Pitchounette is 5 hours away from where I live, and the doors are closed for the moment. I will add them to you as soon as I can.   Thank you for reading me, thank you for your contribution, however small. I would like to propose you some exchanges. Come and spend a day, a week or a month on our beautiful French Riviera, participating in a project in the heart of a family. We look forward to sharing tea with you at Pitchounette. Pitchounette: It is a name that comes from the Patois of the south of France which is an emotional way of saying little, gamine.  Read more

title: need help buying a car and getting back to work
Description: Good morning, ladies and gentlemen. With this message, I come to ask for help from those who will be able to understand the situation in which I find myself and who pushes me to make this request. I am the father of a 3-year-old boy and my wife lost her job in 2021 following the covid 19 epidemic. She was able to pass her driver's license and so we are now looking for a used car with automatic transmission so that she can find a job. This loss of employment has caused us to lose money and puts us in need now. We have no way to get help to be able to get this car and so that's why we're asking for your help today. We would be very grateful if you could help us with this fundraiser that I have set up so that we can get our heads out of the water and find the breath of fresh air that you can bring us. I hope that this message can be understood and that those affected by our situation can help us. We will be very grateful for this help. With all our sincerity.Read more
